import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import CreateOutlinedIcon from '@mui/icons-material/CreateOutlined'; import DeleteOutlineOutlinedIcon from '@mui/icons-material/DeleteOutlineOutlined'; import axios from 'axios' import backendUrl from '../../const' function ReactTable() { const [contacts, setContacts] = useState([]) // api call to backend and store to contact state useEffect(() => { async function fetchData() { await axios.get(`${backendUrl}/contacts`) .then(resp => setContacts(resp.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } fetchData() }, []) return (
